original_title: First Time 7: Gone... with the Wind
overview: First Time 7 finds two cute young sailors washed up on a tropical island, trying to figure out how they got there and remembering nothing but a storm - and a wild night back in civilization before they set to sea. The vast majority of the tape focuses on that evening, from the cheerfully good natured and sexy romping with bikini-clad girls at a strip club to the pairing off of multiple young men in uniform for some special formation drills behind closed doors or outdoors in the countryside. Excellent production values, attractive settings and appealing young performers make this an enjoyable tape. It's impressive how these otherwise nearly hairless young men manage to pack around their cocks and assholes. Good anal camerawork making this a fine recommendation for those who like youthful European men in uniform getting it on - with a hint of their culture, old and new.
title: First Time 7: Gone... with the Wind
